fields.Title: ICE / AFTER CRYING KIM
fields.Description: Automatically starts after Acele's dialogue ends with her line "Crying is good. Get it out and then maybe we can talk, okay?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A what?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In the future, could you please re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In the future, could you please refrain from emoting too much on duty? The quasi-legal status of the RCM means we need to project strength twice as consistently as any other police force in the world."
fields.Alternate1: "Even so, in the future, could you please refrain from emoting too much on duty? The quasi-legal status of the RCM means we need to project strength twice as consistently as any other police force in the world."

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds like typical macho bullshit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like typical macho bullshit to me."

fields.Title: Drama: "'Tis possible thou couldst persuade..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'Tis possible thou couldst persuade the lieutenant 'twas all a part of thy 'unorthodox' method. But can thou persuade *thyself*?

fields.Title: You: ""What's there to talk about?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's there to talk about?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So, what do *you* think happened?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, what do *you* think happened?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you."

fields.Title: You: ""I can. And I'm sorry, Kim. I promi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can. And I'm sorry, Kim. I promise this is the last time."

fields.Title: You: "Convince yourself that you *didn't*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Convince yourself that you *didn't* melt down just now.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uh huh.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh huh."

fields.Title: You: ""Right. I mean, who *cries* in publ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right. I mean, who *cries* in public, like for real?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Glad to hear it was 'minor.' Can y..."]
You: ""... you could torture me, abandon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... you could torture me, abandon me, even *divorce* me, and I'd be dry as a desert, yessir." (Wipe your eyes.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. A clever ruse. I see.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. A clever ruse. I see."

fields.Title: You: ""I experienced a minor malfunction...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I experienced a minor malfunction. I'm okay now."

fields.Title: You: ""The RCM?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The RCM?"

fields.Title: You: ""You don't. But you *will*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't. But you *will*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant blinks. "So you're s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant blinks. "So you're saying you *didn't* break down in tears just now and nearly tear your shirt off?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you, uh, want to *talk* about w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you, uh, want to *talk* about what just happened?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then let's go.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then let's go."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, I'll control my emotions.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I'll control my emotions."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who indeed?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who indeed?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant merely nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant merely nods.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""In the future, could you please re..."]
You: ""Don't worry, Kim, it was *all a ru..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry, Kim, it was *all a ruse*." (Wink at Kim.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's us. Revachol Citizens Milit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's us. Revachol Citizens Militia. The police."

fields.Title: You: ""That's probably a good idea.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's probably a good idea."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Normally I'm opposed to discussing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Normally I'm opposed to discussing one's feelings, especially on-duty, but I think this is an exceptional case..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Glad to hear it was 'minor.' Can y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Glad to hear it was 'minor.' Can you go on?"

fields.Title: You: ""The end is near anyway, I might as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The end is near anyway, I might as well see this through..."

fields.Title: Drama: "Thy pen of lies runneth dry. Best t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Thy pen of lies runneth dry. Best to simplie deny the Truth baldfacedly.

fields.Title: Empathy: "You get the feeling you're being ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You get the feeling you're being handled with kid gloves because your cheeks are still soaking wet.

fields.Title: You: ""What? Nothing happened!!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What? Nothing happened!!"

fields.Title: You: ""I've never cried once in my life...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've never cried once in my life..."

fields.Title: You: ""It's when you totally break down a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's when you totally break down and it feels a little better afterwards. I don't know where I got the expression from. I may have just invented it."

fields.Title: Drama: "Hrmm, methinks my liege doth protes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hrmm, methinks my liege doth protest too much.

fields.Title: You: ""Weakness is strength.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Weakness is strength."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not when projecting strength -- th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not when projecting strength -- then it's just weakness."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. It is my duty, after all.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. It is my duty, after all."

fields.Title: You: ""A crygasm.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A crygasm."

fields.Title: You: ""It was nothing." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was nothing." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, I've definitely never seen yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, I've definitely never seen you cry before, nor lent you my handkerchief to dry your tears."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "A performance that would make the s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A performance that would make the star of a radio melodrama blush.

fields.Title: Drama: "Believeth in thyself, my liege! 'Tw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Believeth in thyself, my liege! 'Twas all a clever ruse.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. Controlling your emotions so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. Controlling your emotions sounds good."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That may be so, but such is Revach..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That may be so, but such is Revachol and this is what is expected of us -- in Revachol."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, then it isn't strength. You'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, then it isn't strength. You're right."

fields.Title: You: ""Absolutely. Superstars always get..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Absolutely. Superstars always get back up and try again."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, right. Enough of this.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, right. Enough of this."
